content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (20d ann. XU100 23.5%) with mixed breadth (3/8 sectors positive), supporting selective risk-taking and rotation into cyclical leaders.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Banking & Finance and Heavy Industry are leading; Banking: AKBNK (1W: +3.74% | 1M: +2.98%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +3.49% | 1M: +3.49%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +2.32% | 1M: +5.84%) ABOVE TREND. Heavy Industry: EREGL (1W: +6.99% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +3.92% | 1M: +6.14%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Retail & Food, Technology & Telecom and Transportation are lagging; Retail: CCOLA (1W: -5.36% | 1M: -3.19%) BELOW TREND, AEFES (1W: -4.15% | 1M: +2.07%) CORRECTION. Technology: KONTR (1W: -4.39% | 1M: -4.29%) BELOW TREND. Transportation: THYAO (1W: -2.81% | 1M: +3.06%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
TRMET (1W: +7.88% | 1M: +10.65%) ABOVE TREND; EREGL (1W: +6.99% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +5.69% | 1M: +1.86%) ABOVE TREND; YKBNK (1W: +4.52% | 1M: +8.66%) ABOVE TREND; KRDMD (1W: +3.92% | 1M: +6.14%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
HEKTS (1W: -6.97% | 1M: -9.17%) BELOW TREND; TKFEN (1W: -5.94% | 1M: +3.30%) CORRECTION; CCOLA (1W: -5.36% | 1M: -3.19%) BELOW TREND; KCHOL (1W: -4.43% | 1M: -0.87%) BELOW TREND; KONTR (1W: -4.39% | 1M: -4.29%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
High 1W movers: TRMET (1W: +7.88% | 1M: +10.65%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +6.99% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +5.69% | 1M: +1.86%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +4.52% | 1M: +8.66%) ABOVE TREND, DOHOL (1W: +3.82% | 1M: -2.40%) RECOVERY.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banks are the clear leadership pocket; AKBNK (1W: +3.74% | 1M: +2.98%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +3.49% | 1M: +3.49%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +2.32% | 1M: +5.84%) ABOVE TREND — favor overweight on high-quant names (VAKBN, HALKB).

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry showing cyclical rebound: EREGL (1W: +6.99% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +3.92% | 1M: +6.14%) ABOVE TREND, VESTL (1W: +3.24% | 1M: -1.95%) RECOVERY — maintain exposure to export-sensitive steel and auto names, trim winners into strength.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Mixed and selective: TRMET (1W: +7.88% | 1M: +10.65%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +5.69% | 1M: +1.86%) ABOVE TREND outperform, while TUPRS (1W: -2.48% | 1M: -13.00%) BELOW TREND and HEKTS (1W: -6.97% | 1M: -9.17%) BELOW TREND lag — prefer commodity-hedged plays and avoid structurally weak chemical names.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-on, favour overweight Banks and selective Heavy Industry/energy momentum names; underweight Retail, Transport and weak Tech/holding names. Use realized low volatility to add exposure on pullbacks and trim into rallies; keep cash buffer for event risk.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
EREGL (1W: +6.99% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND for momentum continuation, TRMET (1W: +7.88% | 1M: +10.65%) ABOVE TREND for follow-through, TUPRS (1W: -2.48% | 1M: -13.00%) BELOW TREND as a value/beat-or-miss catalyst, AKBNK (1W: +3.74% | 1M: +2.98%) ABOVE TREND for bank flows.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking & Finance for breadth confirmation, Heavy Industry for continued cyclical leadership, Energy & Chemicals for commodity-driven divergence.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 directional cues around the 20-day and 50-day moving averages for risk-on extension versus pullback; key catalysts: CBRT commentary, Q4 earnings flow, oil price moves and global risk sentiment (US yields/EM flows).

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Risk-on regime on low volatility with mixed breadth — banks and heavy industry are leading while retail, transport and select tech names lag. Trade selectively: overweight high-quant banks and cyclical industrials, avoid weak chemical/retail names and use pullbacks to add while trimming into strength.
